properties.entry:
SELECT s.Registration_No, s.File_No, sb.Enroll_No, sb.Uni_Enroll_No, sb.First_Name, sb.Last_Name, sb.Father_Name, sb.Gender, sb.DOB, sb.Email_Id, sb.Category_Id, s.Course_Id, s.Branch_Id, sb.created_On, sb.Updated_On, sb.Quota_Id, s.Academic_Year, sb.Semester, sb.Batch_Id, sb.Session_Id, sb.Shift_Id, sb.Centre_Id, sb.Section_Id, sb.Is_Lateral from student_detail s JOIN student_basic sb ON s.File_No = sb.FILE_NO
WHERE s.Registration_No=IFNULL(:Registration_No,s.Registration_No) and s.Course_Id = IFNULL(:Course_Id,s.Course_Id) and s.Branch_Id = IFNULL(:Branch_Id,s.Branch_Id) and ifnull(sb.Email_Id,'-1')=ifnull(:Email_Id,ifnull(sb.Email_Id,'-1')) and ifnull(sb.Enroll_No,'-1')=ifnull(:Enroll_No,ifnull(sb.Enroll_No,'-1')) and ifnull(sb.Uni_Enroll_No,'-1')=ifnull(:Uni_Enroll_No,ifnull(sb.Uni_Enroll_No,'-1')) and ifnull(sb.Self_Mobile_No,'-1') = ifnull(:Self_Mobile_No,ifnull(sb.Self_Mobile_No,'-1')) and sb.First_Name like '%sandeep';
Delete from Academic_Detail where File_No =:File_No and Student_Qualification_Id not in (:Student_Qualification_Id)
Delete from Admission_Discount_Dtl where File_No=:File_No and Discount_Dtl_Id not in (:Discount_Dtl_Id)
Delete from Qualification_Subject_Dtl where File_No =:File_No and Student_Qualification_Id=:Student_Qualification_Id and Stdnt_Subjct_Id not in (:Stdnt_Subjct_Id)
Delete from Qualification_Subject_Dtl where File_No =:File_No and Student_Qualification_Id not in (:Student_Qualification_Id)
Delete from Branch_Preference where File_No =:File_No and Branch_Preference_Id not in (:Branch_Preference_Id)
delete from counselling_Detail where File_No=:File_No and Stdnt_Counslling_Id not in (:Stdnt_Counslling_Id)
delete from STUDENT_DOCUMENTS where File_No not in (:File_No) and Student_Doc_Id not in (:Student_Doc_Id)
